title: 83/407/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 July 1983 approving an amendment to the framework programme pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1362/78 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 29 July 1983
approving an amendment to the framework programme pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1362/78
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(83/407/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment to the framework programme for the acceleration and guidance of collective irrigation works in the Mezzogiorno forwarded by the Italian Government pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 1362/78 on 25 March 1983 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 July 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 166, 23. 6. 1978, p. 11.
(2) OJ No L 322, 18. 12. 1979, p. 30.
